Description: Ensure Offshore Marine safety, quality assurance and control are maintained.Skills
Skills: Valid International Marine Dangerous Goods (IMDG) Certificate
STWC Deck Officer/Engineer Certificate of Competency/ISM Auditor qualification or equivalent
Minimum 5 years’ experience in Marine Operations (Vessel inspection, crewing and offshore rig/vessel/barge)
Good knowledge in Vessel and Marine operations in an oil and gas industry (Offshore/Onshore Operations)
